decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): Location Plan; CB1 Front Elevation Existing; CB2 Front Elevation Proposed (amended 12.02.2024); CB3 Rear Elevation Existing; CB4 Rear Elevation Proposed; CB5 Section Existing; CB6 Section Proposed; CB7 Proposed Window and External Door Replacements Details; CB8 Proposed double glazing details; Planning, Design and Access Statement (amended 12.02.24)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

| Notwithstanding any information submitted with this application, details of the materials to be used for the external surfaces (including brick bond, brick type and brick colour) of the development shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority before any part of the development hereby approved is commenced. The details shall be fully implemented as approved.

Reason:  To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings in accordance with policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1 (h), 1.2 (g) and 2.10 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012), and policy D4 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Single storey side extension, including 2x double glazed timber windows to the front elevation (Following demolition of garage)
